name: Veil of Madness
description:
Welcome to "Veil of Madness," the horror dungeon crawler that will take you on a spine-tingling journey through a decaying Victorian mansion and its overgrown, forgotten gardens. You can play up to 4 characters and play as a brave adventurer, determined to uncover the secrets hidden within the mansion's walls.

There are some known issues like missing strafe keys, proper character customization, and some visual elements that are still temporary like UI elements.  Also, the game lacks detailed playtesting. 

When you start the game, after character customization, there is a 3-page tutorial that sums up the controls and UI elements. Consider checking it before starting to play the game.  Also, here is the control scheme:

W, A, S, D: Movement buttons.

1 & 2: Attack buttons for left and right hand respectively. These are context-sensitive which means if there is no enemy or an interactable area in the front, they do not work.

I: Opens the inventory screen. It supports the drag & drop of items. You need to place the weapons into the character's hands to use them.

ESC: In-game menu

PS: Q & E buttons are for strafe but are not implemented at the moment, sorry.

 That's all. Thanks for checking out and have fun!
